title: Replays?
body:
I just had a horrible game where i hard carried our Adc and got him super feeded yet he did nothing with the kills.

After the game i pushed the download replay thingy which did download it but when i try to look on the while in folder it doesn't work and it opens just a document with alot of text but no replay.

Only way i can look on it is trough the client, is this the way it is supposed to work or?

First time downloading replays, thank you for all help. <3

Shalom. <3

replies.body: You can only view the replays through the client itself I believe, but if you make a highlight you should be able to share that easily. You can save just a clip or the entire thing.
